headlines.title: Nintendo Switch 2: Early review thoughts from our first days with the gaming system
headlines.description: A review in progress with multiple perspectives from the Engadget team.

headlines.title: Live updates: Transgender troops face deadline to voluntarily leave the military
headlines.description: As part of Donald Trump's push to uproot DEI efforts, transgender military service members have until Friday to voluntarily leave or face involuntary separation.

headlines.title: A Japanese lander crashed on the Moon after losing track of its location
headlines.description: “It’s not impossible, so how do we overcome our hurdles?”…

headlines.title: 963 RSP Revealed: Meet Porsche's Street-Legal Le Mans Hypercar
headlines.description: Despite niceties like a fully trimmed interior and silver paintwork, the Porsche 963 RSP is an honest road-going race car made for Roger Penske.

headlines.title: DHS memo details how National Guard will be used for immigration enforcement : NPR
headlines.description: The memo obtained by NPR says troops would be used in activities, including in "night operations and rural interdiction," as well as "guard duty and riot control" inside detention facilities.

headlines.title: Ex-Girlfriend Says Sean ‘Diddy’ Combs Ignored Requests for Escorts to Wear Condoms
headlines.description: Testifying under a pseudonym, the woman has described “hotel nights” involving drugs and sex with escorts that she told the mogul she did not want to continue.

headlines.title: Apple could show off revamped Phone, Safari, and Camera apps next week
headlines.description: Apple is preparing to make major design changes to its Phone, Safari, and Camera apps as part of a broader effort to overhaul its operating systems, according to a report from Bloomberg.

headlines.title: Donald Trump and Elon Musk’s allies urge reconciliation after damaging split
headlines.description: Tech industry fears commercial and political damage from breakdown in relationship between Tesla boss and US president

headlines.title: D-Day Anniversary Brings Remembrance and Unease Among Old Allies
headlines.description: Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth honored the sacrifices of the soldiers who died landing in France 81 years ago. But there was no escaping current tensions.

headlines.title: Billy Joel documentary reveals he attempted suicide twice and was in a coma after affair with friend’s wife
headlines.description: Billy Joel at one point wanted to “end it all,” according to the documentary “Billy Joel: And So It Goes.”
